snippet: If the financing round is completed, Airbnb, which helps arrange short-term housing rentals, will have a valuation of $24 billion.
abstract: Airbnb is negotiating to raise $1 billion in venture capital; financing would value company at $24 billion, more than double its valuation of $10 billion from 2014.
lead_paragraph: If the financing round is completed, Airbnb, which helps arrange short-term housing rentals, will have a valuation of $24 billion.

headline.main: Airbnb Is Said to Seek $1 Billion More in Financing
headline.print_headline: Business Briefing; Airbnb Said to Seek $1 Billion More in Financing
